faq.question: Is SummarizePDF's AI better than Adobe's?
faq.answer: For summarization, yes. SummarizePDF uses Google's latest Gemini models optimized specifically for document understanding, citation extraction, and academic analysis. Adobe's AI is more general-purpose.

faq.question: Can SummarizePDF replace Adobe Acrobat completely?
faq.answer: Only if you primarily use Adobe for reading and summarizing PDFs. If you need advanced PDF editing, form creation, or e-signatures, you'll still need Adobe. For summarization alone, SummarizePDF is superior.

faq.question: How much money will I save?
faq.answer: Adobe AI costs $360/year minimum. SummarizePDF Pro (with more features) costs $228/year - save $132 annually. Starter plan is just $108/year - save $252 annually.

faq.question: Can I import my Adobe PDFs?
faq.answer: Yes! Simply upload any PDF from your Adobe storage to SummarizePDF. All PDF files are compatible, and you can export summaries back to PDF format.
